1.0.name: wordpress/christian-jokes
1.0.description:
Christian Jokes widget will fetch the latest or random joke from christian-jokes.net website, and display them on your blog.

You can select between:
- Latest Joke
- Random joke

Christian Jokes widget uses in-built MagPie for reading data and HTTP Snoopy Client for fetching data from christian-jokes.net.

For less stress on the system, Christian Jokes widget does not use database, but it caches data to a file.
